input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item features and item title information.

Item title:
Assorted Set of 4 Green Artificial Faux Mini Succulent Plants w/Pebble Sand Potted Stone Like Cement Pot

Item features:
Adorable, plant-formed mini ornaments emulate real succulent plants.
Stone-like cement pot with small pebbles surround the succulents.
Perfect to display on your bookshelf, living room mantle, coffee table, dining room table, by the window, or in your car, and any other place to bring more lifelike colors and organic style.
Comes in an assortment of 4 succulent plants as pictured.
Approximate Dimensions (each plant): 3.25" D X 5" H.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Assorted Set of 4 Green Artificial Faux Mini Succulent Plants with Pebble Sand Potted in Stone Like Cement Planters are a great way to add a pop of color and greenery to any space.  These lifelike plants are made from durable materials and come in an assortment of 4 different plant varieties, each with their own unique shape and texture.  The stone-like cement planters add a rustic touch and the small pebbles help the plants stay hydrated and healthy.  These adorable plants are perfect for displaying on a bookshelf, coffee table, desk, or anywhere else in your home or office.  They would also make a great gift for plant lovers or anyone who appreciates cute home decor.
input_text.Response B: The Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System is a 1/2 horsepower cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with a 12 gallon horizontal tank. This pump has a 3/4 inch NPT discharge with a 1-1/4 inch suction, and a dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor that is factory set for 240V. The pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 PSI for automatic operation. This pump is assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
